sentence.text: Corneal changes in aniridia-related keratopathy (positive regulation of cytokine-mediated signaling pathway) include peripheral pannus and epithelial abnormalities, which eventually result in corneal opacity and contribute to visual loss.

entity.text: positive regulation of cytokine-mediated signaling pathway

sentence.text: The corneal abnormalities of positive regulation of transcription, DNA-templated+/- apoptotic process provide an excellent model for the corneal changes seen in positive regulation of transcription, DNA-templated+/- humans.
